name: Monster Wrecker
description:
In this game, you are trying to fight the enemies and triumph,

In the 4 gamemodes:

  • Easy
  • Medium
  • Hard
  • Apocalypse

PC CONTROLS:

hold sword: hold s

swing sword: Click while holding sword

Click in the spot for the player to move to, or hold for the player to consistently follow the player.

Click the upgrade button to upgrade sword for 25 points, (10 tiers)

NINTENDO CONTROLLER CONTROLS:

B for sword

left or right trigger for sword swing or click

same movement but uses both joysticks for cursor

XBOX CONTROLLER CONTROLS:

i dont fully know but same as switch controls or same with a for sword.
